message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that we believe could greatly benefit you. Considering its value and features, I'm offering it to you for $120. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're adding to the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to reach an agreement, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer the product to you for $110. I hope this meets your expectations.
